channel.title: [Pi] Error with Galkons 317 Deob
channel.description:
I tried it out the first time and got this error
[code]Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36[/code] it would log me out as soon as i tried to login.
I deleted [code] getPA().sendCrashFrame();[/code] in client.java serverside. then it would let me log in but i could not see the character, and things were glitchy.
then,
i went into player.java and replaced [code] playerProps.writeByte(headIcon); playerProps.writeByte(headIconPk);[/code] with [code] playerProps.writeByte(0);[/code] it would let me login and i could see my character. i walked around for a few seconds but then it crashed, giving me this error. [code] RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8463) at client.method146(client.java:11561) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:7529) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8387) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:116) at client.run(client.java:4299) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] anyone have any idea on how to fix?

item.title: [Pi] Error with Galkons 317 Deob
item.dc:creator: @xnaraku xnaraku
item.description:
@xnaraku wrote:

I tried it out the first time and got this error

it would log me out as soon as i tried to login.

I deleted

getPA().sendCrashFrame();
in client.java serverside. then it would let me log in but i could not see the character, and things were glitchy.

then,

i went into player.java and replaced

playerProps.writeByte(headIcon); playerProps.writeByte(headIconPk);
with

playerProps.writeByte(0);
it would let me login and i could see my character. i walked around for a few seconds but then it crashed, giving me this error.

RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8463) at client.method146(client.java:11561) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:7529) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8387) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:116) at client.run(client.java:4299) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
anyone have any idea on how to fix?

Read full topic
